      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83255</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Vagues infrarouges et d'ultra-violet</string>
            <string language="en">Infra-red and ultraviolet waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarot- und Ultravioletwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas infravermelhas e da ultravioleta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde di ultraviolet ed infrarosse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρες ακτίνες και υπεριώδη κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas infrarrojas y del ultravioleta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les vagues infrarouges et ultra-violettes sont des vagues en dehors du spectre qui ne sont pas  vues par un oeil humain parce que leurs longueurs d'onde sont soit trop longues soit trop courtes.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that infra-red and ultraviolet waves are waves outside the spectrum that are not seen by a human eye because their wavelengths are either too long or too short.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Produits chimiques</string>
            <string language="en">Chemicals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vagues infrarouges</string>
            <string language="en">infra-red waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la  température</string>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">thermomètres</string>
            <string language="en">thermometers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vagues ultra-violettes</string>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">longueur d'onde</string>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Infrarot- und 
ultraviolette Wellen Wellen außerhalb des Spektrums sind, die nicht 
durch ein menschliches Auge gesehen werden, weil ihre Wellenlängen 
entweder sich sehnen auch oder zu kurz sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as ondas infravermelhas 
e ultravioletas são as ondas fora do spectrum que não são vistas 
por um olho humano porque seus wavelengths são ou long demasiado ou 
demasiado curto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che le onde infrarosse ed 
ultraviolette sono onde fuori dello spettro che non sono viste da un 
occhio umano perché le loro lunghezze d'onda sono o anche desiderano 
o troppo corto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι οι υπέρυθρες ακτίνες 
και τα υπεριώδη κύματα είναι κύματα έξω από το φάσμα που 
βλέπω από ένα ανθρώπινο μάτι επειδή τα μήκη κύματός τους 
είναι είτε πάρα πολύ πολύ είτε πάρα πολύ απότομα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las ondas infrarrojas y 
ultravioletas son las ondas fuera del espectro que no son vistas por 
un ojo humano porque son desean sus longitudes de onda o también o 
demasiado corto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemikalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultravioletwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
